title: Charlotte Protests Planned Against Potential Iran Strikes
summary: Protests against U.S.-Israeli military action in Iran are scheduled for 4 p.m. at Romare Bearden Park.
charlotte_impact: Reflects public concern over international conflicts and potential impacts on local communities.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Pickup Truck in Gastonia
summary: An unattended pickup truck was swallowed by a sinkhole near Airline and Brown in Gastonia overnight. No injuries were reported.
charlotte_impact: Highlights infrastructure issues and potential hazards in the Gastonia area.

title: Early Voting Ends Saturday for North Carolina Primary Elections
summary: North Carolina residents have until 3 p.m. Saturday to vote early in the pivotal primary elections.

title: East Charlotte Shooting Leaves One Critically Injured
summary: An overnight shooting in the 6500 block of E W.T. Harris Boulevard has left one person critically injured.

summary: After morning fog, Charlotte is expected to have a warmer, springlike weekend.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering a faster route between I-77 and U.S. 74.
